meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Doug Jordan Peggi Malys Charlie Brown Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1008.

td.p: Doug Jordan, a mathematician from Columbia, Maryland
Peggi Malys, a medical student from Orlando, Florida
Charlie Brown, an attorney from Utica, New York (whose 1-day cash winnings total $15,601)

tr.td: 20th CENTURY PERSONALITIES
WORD ORIGINS
TV GUIDE SAYS
(Alex: In that category we wil give you the plotline as specified in TV Guide. What you have to do is give us the TV show.)
MEAT
ALLITERATIVE NAMES
WHAT THE "L"
